testgroup.title: DTC check

test1.ptxt: Connect SUZUKI scan tool (SUZUKI SDT) to DLC.
Check control modules communicated by means of CAN for DTCs.

testgroup.question: Is “Control Module Bus OFF” detected at any of control modules?

test1.ptxt: Check for proper terminal connection to each CAN communication circuit at all control module / sensors (communicated by CAN) connectors.

action.ptxt: Go to Troubleshooting for Communication Bus Off:J24B and N32A Model .
Connect connector securely and recheck DTC.

testgroup.title: DTC check
testgroup.question: Is “Lost Communication” detected at any of control modules?

action.ptxt: Go to Troubleshooting for Lost Communication:J24B and N32A Model .

testgroup.title: Communication check of each control module
testgroup.question: Are they possible to communicate with all control modules which communicated by means of CAN by using SUZUKI scan tool (SUZUKI SDT)?

action.ptxt: CAN communication system is good condition.

testgroup.title: DLC circuit check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect SUZUKI scan tool (SUZUKI SDT) from DLC.
Check DLC power circuit, ground circuit and serial communication circuit for breaking, shorting and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: SUZUKI scan tool (SUZUKI SDT) check

test1.ptxt: Check if SUZUKI scan tool (SUZUKI SDT) is communicable by connecting to another vehicle.

testgroup.question: Can SUZUKI scan tool (SUZUKI SDT) communicate properly?

action.ptxt: Go to Troubleshooting for Communication Bus Off:J24B and N32A Model .
Replace SUZUKI scan tool (SUZUKI SDT) and recheck.
